text: Ia Judaba guizbangɨra Moses Osirizir Arazibar akɨnafarim iti, ezɨ me ian mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghore. Ezɨ ia deravɨra Moses Osirizir Arazibar gɨn zuir puvatɨ. Ezɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba, Moses Osirizir Araziba deravɨra dar gɨn zui, ezɨ me men mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba aghorezir puvatɨ. Bar guizbangɨra, ia Judaba, Moses Osirizir Arazibar gɨn mangan koghtɨ, Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba ian araziba tuisɨgh egh mɨkɨm suam, ian araziba ikufi.
